tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Doctor Swetha yadav is like God to me. I have consulted with multiple doctors for the fibroids, Adenomyosis and endrometriosis issues. She is so good and such a patient lady, she gave me plenty of time on my first visit and listened to all my queries,  she is always available over WhatsApp and suggested whenever needed.After so many months of medication, she suggested surgery and surgery also went very well. I am right now recovering slowly.thanks a lot Dr. Swetha for all support and now I am not having the chronic pain for the Endrometriosis. My spouse and I are very happy about her consultation before and after surgery.

review:
Dr Shweta Yadav has been like a guardian angel to us and she ensured that we are going on the right track without any issues.
During the whole pregnancy Shweta mam guided and motivated us and she has been supporting us with all her efforts and so much calmness that we were literally looking forward to meet her for each checkup visit, also the confidence which she helped my wife is totally appreciated and her valuable contribution towards our family is unmatched.
My wife has been highly comfortable with her *** * *** ****** *** **** *** ** *** **** ************* ** ********** 
I would highly recommend anyone to visit her for any issues and a solution is totally guaranteed.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I would like to start this review by thanking Dr. Swetha Yadav endlessly for her service pre and post delivery. Her expertise in high risk pregnancy is amazing just made my journey smooth. She is renowned for her friendliness and politeness towards patients. Just want to thank her for her patience and availability over the phone and whatsapp whenever needed. Mine was (Rh-ve) pregnancy and had complications during 1st trimester and i had lost my confidence almost but Dr supported very well clearing all the doubts and boosting my confidence. Definitely recommend her for all the services during pregnancy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Normal Delivery,
review:
******* *** **** ** *** ** ** *** ****** ***** Sharing my Experience during my wife‚Äôs 3 trimesters after almost a week when she delivered us our bundle of joy

We were very nervous in the starting as this being our first time and we wanted to try all our options. Finally we met Dr. Shweta Yadav and our search process ended

She is so cool, calm and composed and she possess both patience and perseverance, She listens to each and every single query, After our initial meet with her i was so relaxed as she made us so comfortable and and guided our journey like a shining light. She made our journey of 9 months look like a cake walk, She has a very well grip on her subject and she makes sure every thing is aligned well through reports, First and Second trimesters she helped us with every minute details which would be good for mother and baby as this being the building block and foundation be it Fruits, Vegetables & Additional Medicines for Iron, Calcium‚Ä¶

She is available 24/7 whenever we needed she was there for us during the journey, Last trimester she takes additional care and depending on our situation she said we can go for Normal Delivery. We followed her advice religiously. As per her Advice on 25th July, 2021 We were blessed with a Baby Boy - Normal Delivery. The Scene is still fresh in my eyes when she put on her doctor‚Äôs green court and made her progress to the ward in midnight and just in another few mins‚Ä¶She delivered our little bundle of joy‚Ä¶üôÇüôè

Through My Entire Journey, I have noticed the entire workforce at ovum are so cooperative and they maintain the hospital so clean and in accordance. The Hospital Management is so Good that i did not face any issue during these unprecedented times - Covid 19‚Ä¶All thanks to the every charming and Smiling hospital management staffs

For my journey i had constant Support from PRO - Mr Rajesh & Mrs Fathima Sister they guided me helped me in booking and assisting me with packages, even Mr Anil from Admissions and Billing team helped me with the Cashless Insurance Experience‚Ä¶

A big shout out to all the nursing staffs and peer doctors, duty doctors and all the lab people and all the hospital management people, i really had a very pleasant and seamless delivery experience
THANK YOU ALL‚Ä¶üôÇüôÇüôÇüëç

Hi 
Thank you for the elaborate feedback about the entire experience.. all the detailing is highly appreciated. 
Writing this note of gratitude on behalf of the entire ovum team that helped you sail through your beautiful journey to Parenthood !

tags: None
review:
It has been a very pleasant experience consulting Dr. Shwetha. Visiting her for my wife's second pregnancy (7wks at the moment of this post). Had not so pleasant experience at a different doctor a week ago when she tested positive for pregnancy & hence we decided to visit change the doctor. We narrowed down to Dr.Shwetha based on proximity to our place & more importantly based on the feedback in Practo. We absolutely concur with the positive feedback that others have given. 

She took time in getting the complete history of first pregnancy, delivery, medical history & current medical condition. She patiently went through every specific aspect related to pregnancy & made notes...never gave us a feeling that she wanted to quickly get over & move on to the next patient...instead she encouraged us to speak out, provide details & ask questions...she asked us to continue the existing tablets until we finish them before switching on to her prescribed tablets...this was so pleasing to see that she did not undermine the good suggestions from the prior doctor or overrule them just for the sake of it...so unlike the current breed of commercial doctors - pardon me for saying that.

While we will go back to Hyderabad for delivery as that's our hometown, we instantly made up the decision that she will be our doctor as long as we are here in Bangalore...we both strongly recommend her & would like to thank both Practo & it's users for leading us to her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

review:
Dr. Shweta Yadav was very polite and patient through out clearing all my doubts during my pregnancy. 
I personally thank her for the smooth delivery of mine and that too normal delivery when i myself wanted C-section, it was Dr. Shweta Yadav who advised me to go for normal delivery and boosted my confidence. 
Thank you doctor for all your support and guidance. You are an amazing doctor. 
Your sincere concern and reassurance meant a lot to me. 
Thank you for going out of your way to make me feel comfortable during my pregnancy and postpartum phase. 
You are truly a blessing, thanks a lot

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
context: Obstetrics / Antenatal Care,High-Risk Pregnancy Care,Pregnancy Check Up,
review:
We had very bad obstetrics history with repeated abortion and ectopic pregnancy. This was our third IVF conception. So we started consulting Dr Swetha Yadav mam from 24week gestation ( 6 months pregnancy) for safe delivery. 
She studied our case completely, took necessary precautions by taking consideration of reproductive immunologist, endocrinologist. Gave us enough confidence to go through this phase with happy ending by handing over healthy baby boy to us üòÄ. 
Thanku mam for everything u did. 
We called u in ur busy schedule, msgd u in midnight and u were there always to reply back with positive energy. It helped a lot to boost our confidence. 

Thanku u and ur whole team for such pleasant journey.

review: I'm recently blessed with a second baby after a course of 7 months medication with Dr. Shwetha Yadav, her patience towards understanding our concern and solution was outstanding. I had an ectopic pregnancy during 2016, due to which I lost one of my Fallopian tube through laproscopic surgery.  Also, i've PCOD and irregular menstruation. I was advised by my earlier consultant that there is less chances to get conceive. We already got a child 8 year old, but still husband and myself eager to become parent for second time.  She correctly guided us know the history and advise few medication. Now,  we both blessed with a second child. Thanks to Dr.  Shwetha madam.

tags: None
review: I can at 2 and it‚Äôs 4 already and I‚Äôm still here! They just make you wait wait wait!!!! If the doctor is busy they should not let us book appointment ****** ** *** *** **** ** **** ************ *** **** **** *** **** **** ****
reply_text:
Hi., 
Am extremely sorry that you had to wait for so long for a consultation‚Ä¶ 
Unfortunately., sometimes we get unscheduled emergencies and attending to an emergency delivery/ surgery can be the only cause for such delay., during which time I do inform the receptionist/ Opd staff to reschedule the existing appointments and inform the waiting patients.
With all due respect., I confirm that I would be the last person to show carelessness towards my waiting patients. 
Hope you have understood the issue.
Thank you for taking time to share a feedback!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr should have explained about more dos and don‚Äôt since it‚Äôs our first pregnancy confirmation. Motivational part also missed As  I understand that‚Äôs only connect patient with doctors. Not able to judge now, it‚Äôs only my feelings since this is my first visit 
I don‚Äôt know this all because of COVID pandemic or what‚ùóÔ∏è‚ùóÔ∏è
reply_text:
Hi
I usually like to have a very leisurely consultation and more so when it's the first visit for pregnancy confirmation, but as you have rightly analysed, there is a deliberate attempt to cut short the consultation time to reduce the exposure time during consultation in the best interest of the patient. 
However, I shall be eager to help you out with your doubts if any, with a more leisurely teleconsultation. 
Thank you for your valuable feedback!
